newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU confirms 39.6 Ecus/100 kg sugar export rebate.
newsitem.headline: EU confirms 39.6 Ecus/100 kg sugar export rebate.

text.p: The European Union set a maximum export rebate of 39.600 Ecus per 100 kilos for the export of 52,600 tonnes of current series white sugar at the weekly export tender, European Commission officials confirmed.

The confirmation cleared confusion after London-based sugar traders and British sources had questioned the rebate which had earlier been reported by the German Intervention Board (BLE). --Brussels newsroom +322 287 6830
